project.name: riflebird-agency
project.vision: Help businesses increase online traffic and revenue by boosting their digital presence through expert digital marketing services

primaryProblem.title: Low Online Visibility and Poor Traffic Conversion
primaryProblem.description: Low Online Visibility and Poor Traffic Conversion

solutionSpace.overview: A digital marketing agency website that showcases SEO, Google Ads, and Social Media Advertising services, with integrated contact forms and newsletter subscription for lead generation

capabilities.name: Browse Marketing Services
capabilities.description: View detailed information about SEO, Google Ads, and Social Media Advertising services

capabilities.name: Book Consultation
capabilities.description: Schedule a meeting with the agency team through integrated Calendly booking system

capabilities.name: Contact Agency
capabilities.description: Submit inquiries and questions through contact form

capabilities.name: Subscribe to Newsletter
capabilities.description: Sign up to receive marketing tips and updates via email

personas.name: Small Business Owner
personas.description: Business owner looking to increase online visibility and revenue through digital marketing services
goals: Increase website traffic and online visibility
Convert more website visitors into paying customers
Get expert help with SEO, Google Ads, and social media advertising
